lines.text: I shall never rest until I bring him to justice.
'Diabolical' is a mild word for the fate in store for you.
Pyranor himself said, 'Revenge is sweet,' except when it backfires.
Cyclo to all Cyclo Sentinels... Initiate herding action into my Maze of Horror.
Great Galaxy. What are those weird things?
So you were watching on your screen, huh? I'm going to have to cut off mutual scanning.
